data.title: Michael Madsen Warrant: Kill Bill actor wanted for alleged child support debts
data.meta_description: Madsen is reportedly said to owe around $570,000 in back payments for child and spousal support
data.text:
(CBS) - Police have issued an arrest warrant for "Kill Bill" actor Michael Madsen, who allegedly owes more than half a million dollars of unpaid child support, according to reports.

PICTURES: Most Outrageous Mug Shots

According to court documents, obtained by celebrity gossip site TMZ, Madsen was found in contempt of court earlier this month after failing to show up at a hearing regarding his child and spousal support case.

The 53-year-old actor is said to owe around $570,000 in debt, according to the gossip site.

Los Angeles Police Department issued the warrant Monday morning and set his bail to $26,000.

Madsen has two sons with Jeannine Bisignano and is currently married to Deanna Morgan.
